backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining types and CRUD logic for services, user profiles, support requests, orders, and notifications with admin-gated mutations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two HomePage.tsx modifications related to premium-services-old section ID and smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file mapping frontend paths to short summaries of their functionality and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and dark-mode tokens plus global background and border styling.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML that mounts the React app and loads Tidio script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router setup defining all application routes wrapped in ThemeProvider and BrandLayout, with AuthGate-protected pages.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Component that blocks access to protected routes by redirecting unauthenticated users to login while showing a loading state.
frontend/src/components/BrandFooter.tsx: Footer component with brand info, navigation links, contact details, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, auth actions, and mobile menu using Internet Identity login and logout.
frontend/src/components/BrandLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/OtpDemoField.tsx: Demo OTP generator and verifier allowing users to enter and validate a 6‑digit code.
frontend/src/components/ProductAddToCart: Product order component handling sample selection, form fields, auth checks, and add‑to‑cart mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProductOrderForm: Form fields for brand name and detailed description with word counting.
frontend/src/components/ProductSampleSel: Grid selector for product sample images with visual selection highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Simple service display card with icon, name, price range, delivery time, and optional action.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToCart.ts: Provides add‑to‑cart mutation and hook for fetching caller orders via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Returns authentication status and principal based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity client, login flow, and stored identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderPayment.ts: Mutation hook to update order payment status and refresh caller orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: React Query hook that fetches available services from the actor when ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Provides mutations for submitting support requests and a query for retrieving them, refreshing cache on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the caller’s user profile using React Query with actor-based API access.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind layers and custom theme variables for light/dark modes plus utility and service card styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap rendering with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessCardPage.tsx: Product page showing business card details, banner, and add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with email and WhatsApp links styled as interactive cards.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying services, support requests, user profile, and order workflows with form handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, service listings, and navigation logic for ordering products.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity authentication and redirecting on success.
frontend/src/pages/LogoDesignPage.tsx: Product page presenting logo design details, banner, and add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentPage.tsx: Displays order details, handles loading and missing order states, and navigates to a payment success page after a placeholder payment action.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Updates an order’s payment status to completed and shows a confirmation or error state depending on the update result.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoFramePage.tsx: Shows a product page for photo frames with description, banner image, and an add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Loads and displays service pricing cards and shows accepted payment methods like Stripe and PayPal.
frontend/src/pages/ProductBannerPage.tsx: Renders a product banner showcase page with description, preview image, and add‑to‑cart options.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists available services and routes users to login or dashboard when ordering depending on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, multi‑step signup, form validation, OTP check, and profile creation before navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash‑based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Implements word‑count‑based description validation with a 1000‑word limit and exposes a word‑count helper.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for a premium UI theme.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current architecture, features, known issues, and design/tech requirements for the Elvra Worldwide site.
